creditline: Gift of Dr. Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: indigo quilted jacket; light brown band around waist; three characters of light brown script on each side of collar; rectangular sleeves; thick quilted hem around collar and front opening; smaller hem around bottom opening and sleeve openings; ribbon loops at interior bottom openings and on back seam for tying/securing jacket; large red circle with white outline on upper back, with blue character outlined in white inside circle
inscription: on recto: 津久田 {Tsukuda}; on verso: 有志 {yūshi} (volunteer)
title: Fireman's short coat (hikeshi-banten) for a volunteer
